original_title: Ron Arad – Not Without White Gloves
overview: This film documents a year in a life of an artist who takes an object that symbolized speed, movement, and momentum before it was abandoned – and crushes it in order to make it a living art work. By capturing significant moments in the process, as the concept evolves to become a major international exhibition, this film explores the life and art of Ron Arad
title: Ron Arad – Not Without White Gloves
